import React, { useState } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' function ProjectForm({ postProject, history, edit, editProject, projectId }) { const [state, setstate] = useState({ projectName: '', startDate: '', targetEndDate: '', }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() switch (e.target.name) { case "create": postProject(state) history.go(0) case "edit": console.log("ok") editProject(projectId, state) } } console.log(edit) const handleChange = (e) => { setstate({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
Modal title
{edit ?
:
}
) } export default withRouter(ProjectForm)
